channel.title: 2025-10-01 09:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-10-01 09:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 01 Oct 2025 09:30
item.description:
For a day.

Switched off my phone from airplane mode first thing this morning to check on the ‘Shutdown’ status and as expected congress did fail to secure those 60 votes. Also received a couple emails mentioning my position was non-excepted and hence I was effectively furloughed.

Received another email around 2200 stating my position is now considered excepted and I need to report back to work the next working day. Alrighty, we’re back in business. ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded:
For a day.

Switched off my phone from airplane mode first thing this morning to check on the ‘Shutdown’ status and as expected congress did fail to secure those 60 votes. Also received a couple emails mentioning my position was non-excepted and hence I was effectively furloughed.

Received another email around 2200 stating my position is now considered excepted and I need to report back to work the next working day. Alrighty, we’re back in business. ðŸ”—
